channel.title: [Urgent] Account Strealing Plot
channel.description:
I know this may be a retarded post, but some of our members may not be the greatest. I'd like to try to ensure safety of all members and their accounts. So, without further wait:
[b]Those of you that have followed the directions from "www.projectrs2t.x.am", you might want to hurry up and change your password![/b] www.projectrs2t.x.am is a free forum webhosting website, as far as I know. The email isn't even of the projectrs2t.x.am domain. We all know this is a blatant scam, ect. ect.
I had an idea for these guys though. Who likes to spam emails? I think all of us should submit one or two (Or how ever many email addresses you have) of these, but with fake credentials.
This will hopefully keep people safe as they will be sorting through all of the emails, thinking they're real.
What do you guys say? :P

item.title: [Urgent] Account Strealing Plot
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

I’d just like to make it clear, I did report the post and I assume that’s why the topic got locked, and I know better than to believe his lousy scam, so, Fellixobmc or whatever your name was, I didn’t get hacked… Just wanted to make it clear that I’m not gullible, and I know better…

make fun of me thanks.
pwned, i see your statment

Read full topic

item.title: [Urgent] Account Strealing Plot
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

I saw this scam and banned that user.

I don’t know why people fall for these types of scams, because they are screaming FAKE! It really shows how dumb/misinformed many the majority of internet users are.

Read full topic
